name: MAM Simple Accordion
author: MAMUN KHAN

sections.description:
MAM Simple Accordion by http://mamunkhan.net/plugins

This plugin will add an expand collapse accordion feature inside a post or page.

Plugin Features

  • Shortcode System
  • TinyMCE Button added for generating Shortcode.
  • Very Lightweight. Only 15KB.
  • Easy documentation
    & many More.

Live Preview: http://mamunkhan.net/plugins/mam-simple-accordion/
sections.installation:
1. Install as a regular WordPress plugin
  2. You have to use shortcode for generate accordion in post or page. Example shortcode is given below.
    [mamaccordion][item title=”Title”]Your content here….[/item] [item title=”Title”]Your Content here…[/item] [item title=”Title”]Your content here…[/item][/mamaccordion]

short_description: This plugin will add an expand collapse accordion feature inside a post or page.
